ED_Title: Approval of the appointment of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights
ED_DecisionText: At its 111th plenary meeting, on 10 August 2018, the General Assembly approved the proposal of the appointment by the Secretary-General  of Ms. Michelle Bachelet (Chile) as United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights for a four-year term of office of four years beginning on 1 September 2018 and expiring on 31 August 2022.
